snippet: The police blocked hundreds of supporters of the conservative candidate in El Salvador’s presidential election from reaching a hotel where the authorities were doing a final count Monday for the runoff contest.
abstract: Police block hundreds of supporters of Norman Quijano, conservative candidate in El Salvador's presidential election, from reaching hotel where final vote count is being conducted; protestors demand recount after initial results show rival Salvador Sanchez Ceren ahead by narrow margin.
lead_paragraph: The police blocked hundreds of supporters of the conservative candidate in El Salvador’s presidential election from reaching a hotel where the authorities were doing a final count Monday for the runoff contest.

headline.main: El Salvador: Demonstrators Blocked at Count of Vote in Presidential Runoff
headline.print_headline: El Salvador: Demonstrators Blocked at Count of Vote in Presidential Runoff
